data.message: Happy 12th birthday.. Let's celebrate together.... And i would like to take this opportunity to thank you so very much for backing up my childhood with my bestie friends.. Without this website, I found hard to meet and see those friends in person... Once again, thanks so very much for your efforts to make this website exist..... I'm proud of being part of this website...

replies.message: Thanks for the kind words, Leakhena. We're grateful to have people like you in our community. Happy Friends Day! -Rey
Facebook I can't seem to find mine. How do I access it? Also, there's no option on a friends video to watch mine. HELP
I agree!  HELP!! I can't find mine either.

Thanks for your question, Lynne. If you have enough content for us to create a video, it will appear in your News Feed. You can also visit http://on.fb.me/1R6Pym0 to see your video when it's ready. -Rey
I would like to make one could some one help
Why does it say I don't have enough content? How is that possible??

Facebook! I agree! Y'all are the bomb :-) When are y'all going to make a smartphone???? Majority of people use their smartphones for facebook over half of the day anyway....FACEBOOK SMARTPHONE MARKET RESEARCH...LOL
Facebook  mine says I don't have enough content.  Can't be right.  I've got SO many pictures and stuff on my page.  HELP please
AHelp !!!!!! What Dose That Mean Not Enough Content I Have Over 900 friends And Thousands Upon Thousands Of Photos Not sure What Content you need???????
